== Puthuppally (CT) (628265) ==

Puthuppally (CT) is a town in the [[Karthikappally]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 7.07 sq. km. and harbouring 5428 households with total population of 20390 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 115 km. Male population is 9179 and female population is 11211. Scheduled Caste population is 2423 and Scheduled Tribes population is 39. Census Location Code of the town is 628265<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 35 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Kayamkulam at a distance of 4 km.
